content:
It was my pleasure to help! I'm thrilled to hear that you feel more confident about adding beads and blocking your lace shawl. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Remember to have fun and be patient with the beading process. It's a great way to add a personal touch to your shawl, and I'm sure it will look stunning. And when you're ready to block your shawl, just take your time, follow the tips, and you'll be amazed at how it transforms.

You're welcome, and I'm always here to help. I'm excited to see how your shawl turns out, and I'm sure your niece will love it. Good luck, and happy crafting!

(And don't forget to enjoy the process and take breaks when needed. Crafting should be a joyful experience, and I'm sure you'll have a blast making this special gift for your niece.)
